duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership to deliver critical business goals and expand product management capabilities for cloud, data center, server, and storage services.
Manage product releases and prioritize delivery of mission-critical programs based on business strategy.
Develop product cost models and analytics to benchmark services vs the market.
Drive well-educated decisions across product, engineering, design, and data science representatives.
Develop and maintain relationships with external vendors and service providers.
Partner with security and compliance functions to ensure products meet all security requirements.
Provide leadership, supervision, coaching, and guidance across the team to achieve internal priorities and goals.
Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, leveraging product and technology reuse.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, STEM Majors or related (Master’s preferred)
